name: medulloblastoma
definition: An infratentorial cancer that is located_in the lower part of the brain and is a type of primitive neuroectodermal tumor. [url:http\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medulloblastoma, url:http\://www.cancer.gov/dictionary?CdrID=45780]

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, medulloblastoma cell lines with TP53 mutations had significantly less sensitivity to the BET inhibitor, JQ1, than cell lines carrying wild-type TP53 (PMID: 24231268).

references.title: BET bromodomain protein inhibition is a therapeutic option for medulloblastoma.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, medulloblastoma cell lines with TP53 mutations had significantly less sensitivity to the BET inhibitor, JQ1, than cell lines carrying wild-type TP53 (PMID: 24231268).

references.title: BET bromodomain protein inhibition is a therapeutic option for medulloblastoma.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, LY2940680 was demonstrated to bind to the Smo receptor and inhibit hedgehog signaling in a human medulloblastoma tumor cell line (Cancer Research: April 15, 2011; Volume 71, Issue 8, Supplement 1, Abstract #2819).

references.title: Abstract 2819: Identification and characterization of a novel smoothened antagonist for the treatment of cancer with deregulated hedgehog signaling

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a clinical case study, SMO D473H was identified in a medulloblastoma patient harboring PTCH1 W844C with secondary resistance to Erivedge (vismodegib) (PMID: 19726788).

references.title: Smoothened mutation confers resistance to a Hedgehog pathway inhibitor in medulloblastoma.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, LY2940680 treatment of Ptch+/- p53-/- transgenic mice, which spontaneously develop medulloblastoma, resulted in significant anti-tumor activity (Cancer Research: April 15, 2011; Volume 71, Issue 8, Supplement 1, Abstract #2819).

references.title: Abstract 2819: Identification and characterization of a novel smoothened antagonist for the treatment of cancer with deregulated hedgehog signaling

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, CD532 inhibited cell growth of MYCN-amplified medulloblastoma cell lines significantly more than nonamplified lines (PMID: 25175806).

references.title: Drugging MYCN through an allosteric transition in Aurora kinase A.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, the fusion of murine colony stimulating factor 2 with residues 6-76 of Ccl2 (named GMME1) bound to the receptor C-C motif chemokine 2 and induced apoptosis in human and mouse medulloblastoma cell lines (PMID: 21943176).

references.title: A MCP1 fusokine with CCR2-specific tumoricidal activity.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, treatment with arsenic trioxide resulted in improved survival in a transgenic mouse model of medulloblastoma expressing SMO W535L (PMID: 21183792).

references.title: Arsenic trioxide inhibits human cancer cell growth and tumor development in mice by blocking Hedgehog/GLI pathway.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, BI2536 treatment inhibited growth of patient-derived PLK1-overexpressing medulloblastoma cells in culture (PMID: 24019381)

references.title: Personalizing the treatment of pediatric medulloblastoma: Polo-like kinase 1 as a molecular target in high-risk children.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, JQ1 inhibited MYC expression and decreased viability of MYC-amplified medulloblastoma cells in culture, and increased survival in MYC-amplified medulloblastoma xenograft models (PMID: 24297863).

references.title: BET bromodomain inhibition of MYC-amplified medulloblastoma.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, PW12 inhibited tumor growth in allograft models of medulloblastoma with heterozygous inactivating mutations in PTCH1 and TP53 and over expression of MYCN (PMID: 26029667).

molecularProfile.profileName: MYCN over exp PTCH1 inact mut TP53 inact mut

references.title: Downregulation of MYCN through PI3K Inhibition in Mouse Models of Pediatric Neural Cancer.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, MRT-92 inhibited growth of mouse medulloblastoma cells carrying loss of one copy of the PTCH1 gene (PMID: 25636740).

references.title: MRT-92 inhibits Hedgehog signaling by blocking overlapping binding sites in the transmembrane domain of the Smoothened receptor.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, CCT007093 inhibited proliferation of medulloblastoma cell lines overexpressing Ppm1d in culture (PMID: 22379189).

references.title: HDM2 promotes WIP1-mediated medulloblastoma growth.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, CCT007093 and Nutlin-3 combination treatment demonstrated enhanced growth inhibition in medulloblastoma cell lines over expressing Ppm1d comparing to single agent treatment in culture (PMID: 22379189).

references.title: HDM2 promotes WIP1-mediated medulloblastoma growth.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, CCT007093 and Nutlin-3 combination treatment did not inhibit growth in medulloblastoma cell lines over expressing Ppm1d D314A in culture (PMID: 22379189).

references.title: HDM2 promotes WIP1-mediated medulloblastoma growth.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, LLL12 inhibited Stat3 signaling and proliferaion, induced apoptosis in medulloblastoma cell lines demonstrating constitutive Stat3 activation in culture (PMID: 21526200).

references.title: The small molecule, LLL12, inhibits STAT3 phosphorylation and induces apoptosis in medulloblastoma and glioblastoma cells.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Glabrescione B inhibited proliferation of mouse medulloblastoma cells harboring a Ptch1 inactivating mutation in culture, and inhibited tumor growth in allograft models (PMID: 25476449).

references.title: Gli1/DNA interaction is a druggable target for Hedgehog-dependent tumors.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, MK-4101 completely inhibited tumor growth, prevented regrowth after treatment termination, and improved survival in allograft models of medulloblastoma derived from PTCH1 heterozygous knockout mice (PMID: 26960983).

references.title: MK-4101, a Potent Inhibitor of the Hedgehog Pathway, Is Highly Active against Medulloblastoma and Basal Cell Carcinoma.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Erivedge (vismodegib) inhibited tumor growth in allograft models of medulloblastoma derived from PTCH1 heterozygous knockout mice (PMID: 26960983).

references.title: MK-4101, a Potent Inhibitor of the Hedgehog Pathway, Is Highly Active against Medulloblastoma and Basal Cell Carcinoma.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Ibrance (palbociclib) inhibited proliferation of a C3 medulloblastoma model cell line over expressing constitutively active AKT1, MYC, hTERT, and dominant negative TP53 in culture (PMID: 27012813).

molecularProfile.profileName: AKT1 act mut MYC over exp TERT over exp TP53 inact mut

references.title: DiSCoVERing Innovative Therapies for Rare Tumors: Combining Genetically Accurate Disease Models with In Silico Analysis to Identify Novel Therapeutic Targets.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Ibrance (palbociclib) inhibited proliferation and induced apoptosis in a medulloblastoma model cell line over expressing MYC in culture (PMID: 27012813).

references.title: DiSCoVERing Innovative Therapies for Rare Tumors: Combining Genetically Accurate Disease Models with In Silico Analysis to Identify Novel Therapeutic Targets.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Ibrance (palbociclib) inhibited Rb1 phosphorylation in tumor tissues and improved survival in patient-derived intracranial xenograft models of medulloblastoma (PMID: 27012813).

references.title: DiSCoVERing Innovative Therapies for Rare Tumors: Combining Genetically Accurate Disease Models with In Silico Analysis to Identify Novel Therapeutic Targets.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, SANT1 inhibited survival of medulloblastoma cells with elevated GLI2 and SHH mRNA levels in culture (PMID: 26781311).

molecularProfile.profileName: GLI2 over exp SHH over exp

references.title: Targeting hedgehog signaling pathway in pediatric tumors: in vitro evaluation of SMO and GLI inhibitors.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, GANT61 inhibited survival of medulloblastoma cells with elevated GLI2 and SHH mRNA levels in culture (PMID: 26781311).

molecularProfile.profileName: GLI2 over exp SHH over exp

references.title: Targeting hedgehog signaling pathway in pediatric tumors: in vitro evaluation of SMO and GLI inhibitors.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Odomzo (sonidegib) inhibited cell growth, induced apoptosis in tumor cells derived from spontaneous medulloblastoma of heterozygous PTCH1 knockout mice which also harbored TP53 mutations in culture, and suppressed tumor growth in xenograft models (PMID: 26130651).

references.title: RAS/MAPK Activation Drives Resistance to Smo Inhibition, Metastasis, and Tumor Evolution in Shh Pathway-Dependent Tumors.

references.title: RAS/MAPK Activation Drives Resistance to Smo Inhibition, Metastasis, and Tumor Evolution in Shh Pathway-Dependent Tumors.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, M344 induced apoptosis and inhibited proliferation of medulloblastoma cell lines in culture (PMID: 17230517).

references.title: Inhibitors of histone deacetylases as potential therapeutic tools for high-risk embryonal tumors of the nervous system of childhood.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, NMS-P715 inhibited growth and induced cell-cycle arrest and apoptosis in medulloblastoma cell lines with high levels of TTK expression in culture (PMID: 27633003).

references.title: MPS1 kinase as a potential therapeutic target in medulloblastoma.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, a medulloblastoma cell line harboring MYC amplification demonstrated reduced cell viability when treated with FK866 in culture (PMID: 27076630).

references.title: Myc-Driven Glycolysis Is a Therapeutic Target in Glioblastoma.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, a medulloblastoma cell line harboring MYC amplification demonstrated reduced cell viability when treated with GMX1778 in culture (PMID: 27076630).

references.title: Myc-Driven Glycolysis Is a Therapeutic Target in Glioblastoma.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Prexasertib (LY2606368) decreased proliferation of several pediatric tumor cell lines in culture, including medulloblastoma cell lines (PMID: 28270495).

references.title: The Checkpoint Kinase 1 Inhibitor Prexasertib Induces Regression of Preclinical Models of Human Neuroblastoma.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, MC3629 decreased proliferation and induced apoptosis in human and mouse primary SHH-subgroup medulloblastoma (SHH-MB) derived stem-cell like cells expressing high EZH2 levels in culture, decreased viability of a human SHH-MB cell line expressing high EZH2 in culture, and increased apoptosis and decreased growth of human SHH-MB cell line derived stem-cell like cells in culture and in xenograft models (PMID: 28978137).

references.title: The histone methyltransferase EZH2 as a druggable target in SHH medulloblastoma cancer stem cells.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: WNT-driven medulloblastomas, characterized by CTNNB1 or APC mutations, are associated with favorable prognosis (NCCN.org).

references.title: NCCN.org

evidence.efficacyEvidence: WNT-driven medulloblastomas, characterized by CTNNB1 or APC mutations, are associated with favorable prognosis (NCCN.org).

references.title: NCCN.org

evidence.efficacyEvidence: The combination of TP53 mutation and SHH activating mutation is associated with aggressive disease in patients with medulloblastoma (NCCN.org).

references.title: NCCN.org

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, cells of a Sonic Hedgehog subtype of medulloblastoma expressing a CREBBP mutation demonstrated reduced cell proliferation in culture and decreased tumor size in mouse models when treated with Trichostatin A (TSA) (PMID: 31068675).

references.title: Preferential sensitivity to HDAC inhibitors in tumors with CREBBP mutation.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, cells of a Sonic Hedgehog subtype of medulloblastoma expressing a CREBBP mutation demonstrated decreased tumor size and an extended lifespan in mouse models when treated with Farydak (panobinostat) compared to vehicle (PMID: 31068675).

references.title: Preferential sensitivity to HDAC inhibitors in tumors with CREBBP mutation.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Erivedge (vismodegib) inhibited growth, migration, and colony formation of a human medulloblastoma cell line expressing an FHL2-GLI2 fusion in culture (PMID: 31896750).

references.title: Identification of recurrent FHL2-GLI2 oncogenic fusion in sclerosing stromal tumors of the ovary.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, GANT61 inhibited growth of a human medulloblastoma cell line expressing an FHL2-GLI2 fusion in culture (PMID: 31896750).

references.title: Identification of recurrent FHL2-GLI2 oncogenic fusion in sclerosing stromal tumors of the ovary.
